title: Tech stocks lead a rally; S&P 500 turns positive for year
text: Tech stocks lead a rally; S&P 500 turns positive for year Friday, 23 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Technology shares are surging in midday trading after several big-name companies reported big earnings gains.Microsoft, Amazon and Google's parent company Alphabet are all sharply higher Friday.
